properties.areaDesc: Peoria; Marshall; Fulton; Stark; Schuyler; Knox
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:55AM CST until January 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
...Significant Ice and Snow Accumulations Possible Overnight
Friday Night through Saturday Evening West of the IL River...

* WHAT...A mix of freezing rain and sleet is expected late tonight
and will gradually change to all snow on Saturday. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to
one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois, west of
the Illinois river.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest
forecasts for updates on this situation.

The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the
Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT
